price: (Ne mma no) kaa sε: “Y’agya, srε yεn bͻne ho bͻnefakyε (wͻ Nyankopͻn hͻ) ma yεn, na nokorε sε yεyε abͻneεfoͻ.
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَبَانَا ٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا خَٰطِـِٔينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū yāabānā is'taghfir lanā dhunūbanā innā kunnā khāṭiīna
